localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
blogPost.body: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
blogPost.title: Grapevine 2.0 - Schedule fewer zoom meetings with one-way video updates
blogPost.author: Brandyn Morelli

localize.description: 被没完没了的变速会搞得筋疲力尽？Grapevine允许您每天早上从您的团队获取异步(单向)视频更新。简短的单向视频更新可帮助远程和本地团队保持联系，而无需安排或参加面对面会议。
localize.tagline: 通过单向视频更新安排更少的缩放会议

localize.description: 被沒完沒了的變速會搞得筋疲力盡？Grapevine允許您每天早上從您的團隊獲取異步(單向)視頻更新。簡短的單向視頻更新可幫助遠程和本地團隊保持聯繫，而無需安排或參加面對面會議。
localize.tagline: 通過單向視頻更新安排更少的縮放會議
